    User Creation Function
    All fields will be validated before creating user
    An email will be sent to the user's email address
    boolean
    forgetPin(String name)
    Forget Pin Function for User

    This function will check if user exists, if user exists, it will generate a random password with SecureRandom
    It will then email the user with the new password
    The new password will be hashed and salted before being stored in the database
    The email will prompt user to change password on the next login
    String
    generatePasswordHash(String password, String salt)
    This method is used to generate a salt for a new user
    This method uses BCrypt to generate the password hash
    String
    generateSalt()
    This method is used to generate a salt for a new user with BCrypt
    Salt generation will use the default log_rounds (10)
    String

    This method is used to generate a UID for a new user
    This method will select the maximum UID from the database and increment it by 1 used when a new user is created

      public boolean getLoginStatusFromDB(String username)
      This method is used to get the login status of a user from the database
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user
      Returns:
      True if the user is logged in, false if the user is logged out

    • genUID

      public String genUID()
      This method is used to generate a UID for a new user
      This method will select the maximum UID from the database and increment it by 1 used when a new user is created
      Returns:
      String UID

    • changePin

      public String changePin(String oldPin, String newPin)
      This method is used to change the pin of a user Both parameters will be sanitized and verified before being used Email will be sent to user's email address upon successful pin change
      Parameters:
      oldPin - User's Current Pin
      newPin - User's New Pin
      Returns:
      String Message

    • generateSalt

      public String generateSalt()
      This method is used to generate a salt for a new user with BCrypt
      Salt generation will use the default log_rounds (10)
      Returns:
      String Salt

    • generatePasswordHash

      public String generatePasswordHash(String password, String salt)
      This method is used to generate a salt for a new user
      This method uses BCrypt to generate the password hash
      Parameters:
      password - User's password in plain text
      salt - User's salt
      Returns:
      Password hash in String

    • getPasswordFromDatabase

      public String[] getPasswordFromDatabase(String UID)
      This method is used to get the password and salt from the database
      First element of the array is the password Second element of the array is the salt
      Parameters:
      UID - User's UID
      Returns:
      String[] Password and Salt

    • getEmailFromDatabase

      public String getEmailFromDatabase(String UID)
      This method is used to get the email from the database
      Used to send email to user
      Parameters:
      UID - User's UID
      Returns:
      String Email of the user from the database

    • validatePassword

      public boolean validatePassword(String password, String UID)
      This method is used to validate the password
      The UID will be used to get the password and salt from the database
      The password will be hashed using BCrypt and salted with the salt from the database
      Parameters:
      password - User's password in plain text
      UID - User's UID
      Returns:
      boolean True if password is correct, false if password is incorrect

    • CheckUserExist

      public String CheckUserExist(String username)
      This method is used to check if the user already exists in the database
      If the user does not exist, the method will return null
      If the user exists, the method will return the UID of the user
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the user
      Returns:
      String UID of the user or null if the user does not exist

    • checkUsername

      public boolean checkUsername(String username)
      This method is used to check if the username already exists in the database
      If the username does not exist, the method will return false
      If the username exists, the method will return true
      Used during user creation
      Parameters:
      username - Username to check
      Returns:
      boolean True if username exists, false if username does not exist

    • ValidateUserName

      public boolean ValidateUserName(String username)
      This method is used to validate the username must be alphanumeric and less than 10 characters
      The username must not already exist in the database
      Used during user creation
      Regex: [a-zA-Z0-9]+
      Parameters:
      username - Username to validate
      Returns:
      boolean True if username is valid, false if username is invalid

    • ValidatePin

      public boolean ValidatePin(String pin)
      This method is used to validate the pin must be 6 digits long, and must be numbers only
      Regex: [0-9]+
      Parameters:
      pin - Pin to validate
      Returns:
      boolean True if pin is valid, false if pin is invalid

    • ValidateEmail

      public boolean ValidateEmail(String email)
      This method is used to validate a valid email address
      Regex: ^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Za-z]{2,6}$
      Parameters:
      email - Email to validate
      Returns:
      boolean True if email is valid, false if email is invalid

    • ValidatePhone

      public boolean ValidatePhone(String phone)
      This method is used to validate the phone number
      The phone number must be 8 digits long (Singapore phone number)
      The phone number must be numbers only or 0
      Regex: ^([8-9][0-9]{7}|0)$
      Parameters:
      phone - Phone number to validate
      Returns:
      boolean True if phone number is valid, false if phone number is invalid

    • CreateUser

      public boolean CreateUser(String username, String password, String email, String phone, int AccType)
      User Creation Function
      All fields will be validated before creating user
      An email will be sent to the user's email address
      Parameters:
      username - - Username of user
      password - - Password of user
      email - - Email of user
      phone - - Phone number of user
      AccType - - Account type of user
      Returns:
      - True if user is created, false if user is not created

    • insertUser

      public void insertUser(User user)
      Insert new user into database
      Parameters:
      user - - User object to be inserted into database

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(User user)
      Update user in database with the given user object
      Parameters:
      user - User object to be updated in the database
      Returns:
      boolean True if user is updated, false if user is not updated

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser()
      Update user in database with the current user object, used for updating existing user

    • getUserFromDatabase

      public void getUserFromDatabase()
      Get user from database
      This function is used to get user information from database, and populate the current User object with the information

    • Login

      public boolean Login(String username, String password)
      Login Function for User
      This function is used to login a user
      ALl fields will be checked, if any field is incorrect, login will fail
      An email will be sent to the user if login is successful
      Parameters:
      username - Username of user
      password - Password of user
      Returns:
      Returns true if login is successful, false if login is unsuccessful

    • logout

      public boolean logout()
      Logout Function for User This function will check if user is logged in, if user is logged in, it will set login status to false
      Returns:
      - Returns true if logout is successful, false if logout is unsuccessful

    • logout

      public boolean logout(User user)
      Logout Function for User with User object
      Parameters:
      user - User Object to be logged out
      Returns:
      Returns true if logout is successful, false if logout is unsuccessful

    • forgetPin

      public boolean forgetPin(String name)
      Forget Pin Function for User

      This function will check if user exists, if user exists, it will generate a random password with SecureRandom
      It will then email the user with the new password
      The new password will be hashed and salted before being stored in the database
      The email will prompt user to change password on the next login
      Parameters:
      name - Username of user
      Returns:
      Returns true if forget pin is successful, false if forget pin is unsuccessful
